text: Vasaloppet China () is a cross-country skiing competition held in the beginning of every year in Changchun, China. Originally held in 2003, it has been a part of Worldloppet since 2014. The competition is named after Vasaloppet in Sweden. == References == Category:2003 establishments in China Category:January sporting events Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2003 Category:Skiing in China Category:Ski marathons Category:Winter sports competitions in China
title: Vasaloppet China
